core:property.core:description: The ID of the application which performed the retail transaction (POS...)
The ID of the transaction.
The ID of the location where the transaction took place.
The ID of the device on which the transaction took place.
The ID of the device on which the transaction took place.
The number of the branch where the transaction took place.
The number of terminal which performed the transaction.
The transaction number.
The ID of the user who started the transaction.
The ID of the user who completed the transaction.

The date and time at which the transaction was started, stored in the database as the UTC date for accuracy. The normal, unchanged Date object in the local time zone should be passed in for storage in this field.

The date and time at which the transaction was completed, stored in the database as the UTC date for accuracy. The normal, unchanged Date object in the local time zone should be passed in for storage in this field.
Flag to indicate whether the transaction was performed in training mode.
The basket total of the transaction.
The basket sale item quantity of the transaction.
The basket merchandise item quantity of the transaction.
Flag to indicate whether the transaction is a reversal transaction.
String used for storing external reference.
When this row was changed.
When this data was updated.
Flag to indicate whether the transaction has been voided.
Currency Id from basket if transaction has basket
Flag to indicate whether the transaction was performed in training mode.
Flag to indicate whether the tender was authorised online by the host.
Flag to indicate that this tender was voided
Flag to indicate whether the transaction was performed in training mode.
Flag to indicate that this tender was voided
The transaction id of the originating transaction for return items only.
